response.overview: John Fogerty delivered a triumphant and universally acclaimed performance on the Pyramid Stage at Glastonbury 2025, solidifying his legendary status for a massive, multi-generational audience. Taking the stage on Saturday, June 28th, the 80-year-old rock icon, visibly joyous after recently regaining the publishing rights to his music, powered through an energetic set of Creedence Clearwater Revival classics alongside his sons on guitar. From the opening riffs of "Up Around the Bend" to the thunderous singalongs for anthems like "Bad Moon Rising," "Fortunate Son," and a jubilant "Proud Mary," Fogerty's hour-long masterclass was hailed by critics and fans alike as a definitive highlight of the festival weekend, celebrated for its raw power and timeless appeal.
response.title: John Fogerty: Live at Glastonbury 2025
